Posts.Content: purple87 wrote: Has anyone had their incision start to necrois (die)??  I am 3 wks post op from a dmx with TE.  My rt breadt area has started to necrois..I have an odor coming off of it as well.  The area is red and hot to the touch.  You can also see that it is full of fluid.  Drains were taken out 5 days ago.  Going to see ps tomorrow but wanted to know if anyone else has experienced this. HOPE ALL ARE DOING WELL. Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2013 04:59AM purple87 wrote: Liz, I have the same problem with the two swollen areas under my arms. My PS says this is normal and will go away in time. I know they look weird but if my PS says it will go away then I believe him bc I trust him. Good luck with your recovery.
